name: Dark Waters (Leon-A0)
description:
Controls : To cover and reload unpress "space",  you need to press Space to be able to aim and shoot, to aim and shoot use the mouse, to change weapons press "C" or "Tab", each weapon has its advantages, the pistol is versatile, the machine gun shoots fast, the shotgun does a lot of damage to close targets and the grenade launcher eliminates enemies in an area, the boxes dropped are more ammunition, just shoot them to unblock them.   =>Suggestion ... Use Fullscreen <=

This is your last defense, you are surrounded by the enemy forces, this is it, you are betting everything you have, but if you are strong enough and make it, you will live, muster all your courage and beat the odds.

You know you can.
